skills.skill_justification: Data engineers are responsible for building and maintaining data pipelines, which requires a strong understanding of data movement and management.
skills.skill_level_justification: This is a core responsibility of a data engineer, requiring extensive experience and knowledge.

skills.skill_justification: Data engineers need to work with a variety of tools from the modern data stack, including but not limited to Snowflake, Spark, Dagster, dbt, and Azure Cloud offerings.
skills.skill: Proficiency in modern data stack tools
skills.skill_level_justification: These tools are commonly used in the industry and a data engineer is expected to have a deep understanding of them.

skills.skill_justification: Data engineers need to discover opportunities for data acquisition and implementation solutions.
skills.skill_level_justification: This is a key responsibility of a data engineer, requiring significant experience and knowledge.

skills.skill_justification: Data engineers need to develop production processes and solutions to model, mine and surface data.
skills.skill_level_justification: This is a core responsibility of a data engineer, requiring extensive experience and knowledge.

skills.skill_justification: Data engineers need to improve and ensure data reliability, quality and efficiency.
skills.skill_level_justification: This is a key responsibility of a data engineer, requiring significant experience and knowledge.

skills.skill_justification: Data engineers need to have strong Python and SQL skills, as well as at least general competency with web languages (HTML/Javascript).
skills.skill_level_justification: These are essential tools for a data engineer, requiring proficient use.

skills.skill_justification: Data engineers need to have experience and competency with at least one cloud services provider (Azure preferred; AWS or GCP also worthwhile).
skills.skill_level_justification: These platforms are commonly used in the industry and a data engineer is expected to have a deep understanding of at least one of them.

skills.skill_justification: Data engineers need to have experience and competency with at least one general data orchestration tool, eg Airflow, Dagster, Prefect, or similar other experience.
skills.skill_level_justification: These tools are commonly used in the industry and a data engineer is expected to have a deep understanding of at least one of them.

skills.skill_justification: Communication ability is paramount for data engineers as they need to understand the value of open communication and have a track record of interacting effectively with stakeholders and team members.
skills.skill_level_justification: This is a crucial skill for a data engineer as they need to interact with various stakeholders and team members.
